v8:item.v8:content: Used to specify the bank account
Used to specify the document currency
A discount type set in the document. When the discount type changes, the document table is recalculated if the "Refill discount percentage by type" flag is set.
Contract under which the invoice is registered
Price list column, by which prices in document table are calculated, is specified.
Enterprise company on whose behalf the proforma invoice is created
Prices of product position that are added in document table will be in the selected price list. Document prices are recalculated when the "Refill prices by price list" check box is selected
It is used to specify check box of inclusion VAT into amount
If necessary, you can specify a product characteristic in this field.
Used to specify the VAT amount
Text of the additional String attribute.
